name: Crates vs Barrels: Unpolished Edition
description:
Tutorial:

WASD / Arrow Keys : Move Around

Left Mouse Click: Divide - You sacrifice as many levels as you hold and create a copy when you release the button.

Right Mouse Click: Callback - You can callback damaged clones back. The Magenta highlighted one will be called back.

R: Restart

Crates VS Barrels: Unpolished Edition

A love letter to old-timey freeware games! (Or I suck at art and I'm trying to cover it up!)

You can download the Windows version or play the game online. Online version can be laggy.  Full Screen ADVISED!

You are a barrel and Crates are ATTACKING YOU!

You cannot attack but you can divide!

Credits:

Solo Dev: Caner "Alchemistake" Caliskaner

Game Idea: Caner "Alchemistake" Caliskaner, Begum "Pupurin" Ozcan-Caliskaner

Music is made by Juhani Junkala (Free Licence) (Licenced for GMTK)

Other Assets are Licenced as well.
